channel.title: Wanted to add objects like chaos altar
channel.description:
I want to add two chaos altars on my server (I don't got) my server is RicScape v2 and when you pray at chaos altar 12000 exp each time you pray I will put in a picture below of what and where I wanted chaos altars,but when I add them to objecthandler and client.java save, compile and close folder I open back up and log in on my server nothere there appears!!I will show a pic below of addGlobalObject
[IMG]http://i180.photobucket.com/albums/x303/mystickid2k6/AddGlobalObject.jpg[/img] but I want altar to face south so I would change it to the -1 to -3 right?
what do I do to have the altars appear and have them for use for everyone and give 12000 exp everytime a person prays??? :confused: [br][size=1]Posted on: September 30, 2007, 05:38:20 AM[/size][hr]someone reply please!!

item.title: Wanted to add objects like chaos altar
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

why dont u change the -1 to -3 manually…

Read full topic

item.title: Wanted to add objects like chaos altar
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

I want to add two chaos altars on my server (I don’t got) my server is RicScape v2 and when you pray at chaos altar 12000 exp each time you pray I will put in a picture below of what and where I wanted chaos altars,but when I add them to objecthandler and client.java save, compile and close folder I open back up and log in on my server nothere there appears!!I will show a pic below of addGlobalObject

AddGlobalObject.jpg731×454

but I want altar to face south so I would change it to the -1 to -3 right?

what do I do to have the altars appear and have them for use for everyone and give 12000 exp everytime a person prays???
